Timothy J. Keller (born September 23, 1950) is an American pastor, theologian, and Christian apologist.
He is the Chairman and co-Founder of [https://redeemercitytocity.com Redeemer City to City]. He is also the founding pastor of Redeemer Presbyterian Church in New York City.
He is the author of "The New York Times" bestselling books "The Prodigal God: Recovering the Heart of the Christian Faith" (2008), "Prayer: Experiencing Awe and Intimacy with God" (2014), and ' (2008). The prequel for the latter is "Making Sense of GOD: An Invitation to the Skeptical" (2016).
In June 2020, Keller revealed that he was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer.
